description: Demolition of existing building and erection of a new part 9, part 5 storey building plus basement to provide residential units (Class C3) and flexible ground floor mixed-use commercial, business and service space (Class E) ancillary plant, servicing and blue badge parking, landscaping and associated works (for information purposes this includes 49 dwellings and 592 sqm of flexible commercial, business and service space floorspace (GIA).
